name: Re-VERB wordgame
description:
Welcome to Re-VERB

Highlights
. Weekly competition  500 word drops.
. Competition board.
. Everyone gets the same word drops in sequence.
. Every week is a new drop sequence.
. Winner is set at the end of the week.
. Competition restarts every monday with a score reset.
. Monday - Monday
. Weekly winners can be seen in the competition board ingame.

Re-Verb plays like this.
Everytime a word is dropped, you to make a new word with the blocks on screen. Blocks have a score attached to them, which you will get when you form a new word. Then a new word drop happens until you reach the limit of 500. Every player of Re-VERB, gets exactly the same word drops for that week. The player with the highest score within those 500 word drops is the winner.

Full Explanation ingame!

Have Fun!
